scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='node_modules/.bin/vite';if(fs.existsSync(p)){try{const s=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8').replace(/\r\n/g,'\n');fs.writeFileSync(p,s,'utf8');}catch(e){}try{fs.chmodSync(p,0o755);}catch(e){}console.log('[build] repaired vite bin');}else{console.log('[build] vite bin not found, skipping repair');}}" && vite build
scripts.diag: node -v && npm -v && node -e "console.log('OS:',process.platform);" && ls -la node_modules/.bin || dir node_modules\.bin
